page_content: The page discusses a Waldentwicklungsplan (Forest Development Plan) for the Canton of Zürich for the year 2010 and offers a PDF download.
The page provides comprehensive information about forest management, forest law, and forest-related resources in the Canton of Zürich, including multiple PDF downloads.
The page focuses on planning fundamentals in hydraulic engineering, offering various PDF downloads related to water management and revitalization.
The page offers an overview of environmental protection measures, goals, and practices in the Canton of Zürich, including a downloadable PDF report on alternative energies.
The page focuses on youth crime and delinquency, offering information on laws, regulations, and preventive measures.
The page discusses the planning and regulations surrounding high-voltage installations, focusing on non-ionizing radiation and its impact.
The page focuses on the signalization and guidelines for everyday cycling routes and construction sites, aiming to improve safety and minimize conflicts between different modes of transport.
